channel.title: Are there any descent servers out there?
channel.description: Are there any descent servers out there where you can start on tutorial island and not have a butt load of stuff and that the walking isn't mentally challenged or slow to respond and has all member quests and free quests??? :confused: I'm just fed up w/ all the other servers!!! :mad: :mad:

item.title: Are there any descent servers out there?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Bluurr , Is A Quitter, I Would Host It For Free Again But Noo… Finished With Private Servers…
Pk Isle , No Idea, Try Pk Desert, Thats Pretty Decent

Read full topic
item.source: Are there any descent servers out there?

item.title: Are there any descent servers out there?
item.dc:creator: @v3n0m4 v3n0m4
item.description:
@v3n0m4 wrote:

I thought xlinescape and pk-isle were brilliant servers but bluur (xlinescape owner) quit or something like that and pk-isle has just been down for some reason. Although im not sure if its up now
